name: Love Is Blind, In Space...
description:
A text based adventure game, set in the depths of the darkest spots of space. Love is no asset, that you are guaranteed to have and it should not be taken for granted, it should be worked for. Made by Nazar Viznytsya and Frank Zhang. 

Side note: Sorry for the bugs, it was quite hard managing school, and this.

Some of the scriptable objects weren't connected, fixed that.
